15struct Menu {
16 View* view;
17
18 FuriTimer* scroll_timer;

21typedef struct {
22 const char* label;
23 IconAnimation* icon;
24 uint32_t index;
25 MenuItemCallback callback;
26 void* callback_context;
27} MenuItem;
28
29ARRAY_DEF(MenuItemArray, MenuItem, M_POD_OPLIST);
30
31#define M_OPL_MenuItemArray_t() ARRAY_OPLIST(MenuItemArray, M_POD_OPLIST)
32
33typedef struct {
34 MenuItemArray_t items;
35 size_t position;
36
37 size_t scroll_counter;
38 size_t vertical_offset;
39} MenuModel;

41static void menu_process_up(Menu* menu);
42static void menu_process_down(Menu* menu);
43static void menu_process_left(Menu* menu);
44static void menu_process_right(Menu* menu);
45static void menu_process_ok(Menu* menu);
46
47static void menu_short_name(MenuItem* item, FuriString* name) {
48 furi_string_set(name, item->label);
49 if(furi_string_start_with_str(name, "[")) {
50 size_t trim = furi_string_search_str(name, "] ", 1);
51 if(trim != STRING_FAILURE) {
52 furi_string_right(name, trim + 2);
53 }
54 }
55}
56
57static void menu_string_to_upper_case(FuriString* str) {
58 for(size_t i = 0; i < furi_string_size(str); i++) {
59 char c = furi_string_get_char(str, i);
60 if(c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') {
61 furi_string_set_char(str, i, c - 'a' + 'A');
62 }
63 }
64}
65
66static void menu_centered_icon(
67 Canvas* canvas,
68 MenuItem* item,
69 size_t x,
70 size_t y,
71 size_t width,
72 size_t height) {
73 if(item->icon) {
74 canvas_draw_icon_animation(
75 canvas,
76 x + (width - item->icon->icon->width) / 2,
77 y + (height - item->icon->icon->height) / 2,
78 item->icon);
79 }
80}
81
82static size_t menu_scroll_counter(MenuModel* model, bool selected) {
83 if(!selected) return 0;
84 size_t scroll_counter = model->scroll_counter;
85 if(scroll_counter > 0) {
86 scroll_counter--;
87 }
88 return scroll_counter;
89}
90
91static void menu_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
92 MenuModel* model = _model;
93
94 canvas_clear(canvas);
95
96 size_t position = model->position;
97 size_t items_count = MenuItemArray_size(model->items);
98 if(items_count) {
99 MenuItem* item;
100 size_t shift_position;
101 FuriString* name = furi_string_alloc();
102 switch(xtreme_settings.menu_style) {
103 case MenuStyleList: {
104 for(uint8_t i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
105 canvas_set_font(canvas, i == 1 ? FontPrimary : FontSecondary);
106 shift_position = (position + items_count + i - 1) % items_count;
107 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, shift_position);
108 menu_centered_icon(canvas, item, 4, 3 + 22 * i, 14, 14);
109 menu_short_name(item, name);
110 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, i == 1);
111 elements_scrollable_text_line(
112 canvas, 22, 14 + 22 * i, 98, name, scroll_counter, false);
113 }
114 // Frame and scrollbar
115 elements_frame(canvas, 0, 21, 128 - 5, 21);
116 elements_scrollbar(canvas, position, items_count);
117 break;
118 }
119 case MenuStyleWii: {
120 if(items_count > 6 && position >= 4) {
121 if(position >= items_count - 2 + (items_count % 2)) {
122 shift_position = position - (position % 2) - 4;
123 } else {
124 shift_position = position - (position % 2) - 2;
125 }
126 } else {
127 shift_position = 0;
128 }
129 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
130 size_t item_i;
131 size_t x_off, y_off;
132 for(uint8_t i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
133 item_i = shift_position + i;
134 if(item_i >= items_count) continue;
135 x_off = (i / 2) * 43 + 1;
136 y_off = (i % 2) * 32;
137 bool selected = item_i == position;
138 if(selected) {
139 elements_slightly_rounded_box(canvas, 0 + x_off, 0 + y_off, 40, 30);
140 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
141 }
142 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, item_i);
143 menu_centered_icon(canvas, item, x_off, y_off, 40, 20);
144 menu_short_name(item, name);
145 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, selected);
146 elements_scrollable_text_line_centered(
147 canvas, 20 + x_off, 26 + y_off, 36, name, scroll_counter, false, true);
148 if(selected) {
149 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
150 } else {
151 elements_frame(canvas, 0 + x_off, 0 + y_off, 40, 30);
152 }
153 }
154 break;
155 }
156 case MenuStyleDsi: {
157 for(int8_t i = -2; i <= 2; i++) {
158 shift_position = (position + items_count + i) % items_count;
159 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, shift_position);
160 size_t width = 24;
161 size_t height = 26;
162 size_t pos_x = 64;
163 size_t pos_y = 36;
164 if(i == 0) {
165 width += 6;
166 height += 4;
167 elements_bold_rounded_frame(
168 canvas, pos_x - width / 2, pos_y - height / 2, width, height + 5);
169 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontBatteryPercent);
170 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
171 canvas, pos_x - 9, pos_y + height / 2 + 1, AlignCenter, AlignBottom, "S");
172 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
173 canvas, pos_x, pos_y + height / 2 + 1, AlignCenter, AlignBottom, "TAR");
174 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
175 canvas, pos_x + 9, pos_y + height / 2 + 1, AlignCenter, AlignBottom, "T");
176
177 canvas_draw_rframe(canvas, 0, 0, 128, 18, 3);
178 canvas_draw_line(canvas, 60, 18, 64, 26);
179 canvas_draw_line(canvas, 64, 26, 68, 18);
180 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
181 canvas_draw_line(canvas, 60, 17, 68, 17);
182 canvas_draw_box(canvas, 62, 21, 5, 2);
183 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
184
185 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontPrimary);
186 menu_short_name(item, name);
187 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, true);
188 elements_scrollable_text_line_centered(
189 canvas,
190 pos_x,
191 pos_y - height / 2 - 8,
192 126,
193 name,
194 scroll_counter,
195 false,
196 true);
197 } else {
198 pos_x += (width + 6) * i;
199 pos_y += 2;
200 elements_slightly_rounded_frame(
201 canvas, pos_x - width / 2, pos_y - height / 2, width, height);
202 }
203 menu_centered_icon(canvas, item, pos_x - 7, pos_y - 7, 14, 14);
204 }
205 elements_scrollbar_horizontal(canvas, 0, 64, 128, position, items_count);
206 break;
207 }
208 case MenuStylePs4: {
209 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
210 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
211 canvas, 1, 1, AlignLeft, AlignTop, furi_hal_version_get_name_ptr());
212 char str[10];
213 Dolphin* dolphin = furi_record_open(RECORD_DOLPHIN);
214 snprintf(str, 10, "Level %i", dolphin_get_level(dolphin->state->data.icounter));
215 furi_record_close(RECORD_DOLPHIN);
216 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 127, 1, AlignRight, AlignTop, str);
217 for(int8_t i = -1; i <= 4; i++) {
218 shift_position = position + i;
219 if(shift_position >= items_count) continue;
220 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, shift_position);
221 size_t width = 20;
222 size_t height = 20;
223 size_t pos_x = 36;
224 size_t pos_y = 27;
225 if(i == 0) {
226 width += 10;
227 height += 10;
228 pos_y += 2;
229 canvas_draw_box(canvas, pos_x - width / 2, pos_y + height / 2, width, 9);
230 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
231 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontBatteryPercent);
232 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
233 canvas, pos_x, pos_y + height / 2 + 1, AlignCenter, AlignTop, "Start");
234
235 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
236 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
237 menu_short_name(item, name);
238 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, true);
239 elements_scrollable_text_line(
240 canvas,
241 pos_x + width / 2 + 2,
242 pos_y + height / 2 + 7,
243 74,
244 name,
245 scroll_counter,
246 false);
247 } else {
248 pos_x += (width + 1) * i + (i < 0 ? -6 : 6);
249 }
250 canvas_draw_frame(canvas, pos_x - width / 2, pos_y - height / 2, width, height);
251 menu_centered_icon(canvas, item, pos_x - 7, pos_y - 7, 14, 14);
252 }
253 elements_scrollbar_horizontal(canvas, 0, 64, 128, position, items_count);
254 break;
255 }
256 case MenuStyleVertical: {
257 canvas_set_orientation(canvas, CanvasOrientationVertical);
258 shift_position = model->vertical_offset;
259 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
260 size_t item_i;
261 size_t y_off;
262 for(size_t i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
263 item_i = shift_position + i;
264 if(item_i >= items_count) continue;
265 y_off = 16 * i;
266 bool selected = item_i == position;
267 if(selected) {
268 elements_slightly_rounded_box(canvas, 0, y_off, 64, 16);
269 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
270 }
271 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, item_i);
272 menu_centered_icon(canvas, item, 0, y_off, 16, 16);
273 menu_short_name(item, name);
274 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, selected);
275 elements_scrollable_text_line(
276 canvas, 17, y_off + 12, 46, name, scroll_counter, false);
277 if(selected) {
278 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
279 }
280 }
281 canvas_set_orientation(canvas, CanvasOrientationHorizontal);
282 break;
283 }
284 case MenuStyleC64: {
285 size_t index;
286 size_t y_off, x_off;
287
288 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
289 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
290 canvas, 64, 0, AlignCenter, AlignTop, "* FLIPPADORE 64 BASIC *");
291
292 char memstr[29];
293 snprintf(memstr, sizeof(memstr), "%d BASIC BYTES FREE", memmgr_get_free_heap());
294 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 64, 9, AlignCenter, AlignTop, memstr);
295
296 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontKeyboard);
297
298 for(size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
299 for(size_t j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
300 index = i * 5 + j + (position - (position % 10));
301 if(index >= items_count) continue;
302 y_off = (9 * j) + 13;
303 x_off = 64 * i;
304 bool selected = index == position;
305 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, selected);
306 if(selected) {
307 canvas_draw_box(canvas, x_off, y_off + 4, 64, 9);
308 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
309 }
310 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, index);
311 menu_short_name(item, name);
312
313 char indexstr[5];
314 snprintf(indexstr, sizeof(indexstr), "%d.", index);
315 furi_string_replace_at(name, 0, 0, indexstr);
316
317 elements_scrollable_text_line(
318 canvas, x_off + 2, y_off + 12, 60, name, scroll_counter, false);
319
320 if(selected) {
321 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
322 }
323 }
324 }
325
326 break;
327 }
328 case MenuStyleEurocorp: {
329#ifdef CANVAS_HAS_FONT_EUROCORP
330 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontEurocorp);
331#else
332 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontPrimary);
333#endif
334 for(uint8_t i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
335 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
336 shift_position = (position + items_count + i - 1) % items_count;
337 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, shift_position);
338 menu_short_name(item, name);
339 menu_string_to_upper_case(name);
340 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, i == 1);
341 if(i == 1) {
342 canvas_draw_box(canvas, 0, 22, 128, 22);
343 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
344 // Clip corner
345 for(uint8_t i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
346 for(uint8_t j = 0; j < 6; j++) {
347 if(j - i >= 0) {
348 canvas_draw_dot(canvas, 128 - i, 22 + j - i);
349 }
350 }
351 }
352 }
353 elements_scrollable_text_line(
354 canvas, 2, 19 + 22 * i, 128 - 3, name, scroll_counter, false);
355 }
356 break;
357 }
358 case MenuStyleCompact: {
359 size_t index;
360 size_t y_off, x_off;
361
362 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontBatteryPercent);
363
364 for(size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
365 for(size_t j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
366 index = i * 8 + j + (position - (position % 16));
367 if(index >= items_count) continue;
368 y_off = (8 * j);
369 x_off = 64 * i;
370 bool selected = index == position;
371 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, selected);
372 if(selected) {
373 canvas_draw_box(canvas, x_off, y_off, 64, 8);
374 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
375 }
376 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, index);
377 menu_short_name(item, name);
378
379 elements_scrollable_text_line(
380 canvas, x_off + 1, y_off + 7, 62, name, scroll_counter, false);
381
382 if(selected) {
383 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
384 }
385 }
386 }
387
388 break;
389 }
390 case MenuStyleTerminal: {
391 // Draw a border around the screen
392 canvas_draw_frame(canvas, 0, 0, 128, 64);
393
394 // current dir on the title bar
395 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
396 char title[20];
397 snprintf(title, sizeof(title), "%s@fz: ~/Home", furi_hal_version_get_name_ptr());
398 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 20, 10, title);
399
400 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 118, 9, "x"); // "X" button on the top-right corner
401 canvas_draw_frame(canvas, 116, 2, 8, 9);
402 canvas_draw_frame(canvas, 0, 0, 128, 13);
403
404 // Display the user's name line at the bottom
405 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontBatteryPercent);
406 char prefix[15];
407 snprintf(prefix, sizeof(prefix), "%s@fz:~$", furi_hal_version_get_name_ptr());
408 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 2, 56, prefix);
409
410 size_t name_start_x = 2 + (strlen(prefix) - 1) * 6;
411
412 for(size_t i = 0; i < 4 && (position + i) < items_count; i++) {
413 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, position + i);
414 menu_short_name(item, name);
415
416 size_t scroll_counter = menu_scroll_counter(model, item);
417 if(i == 0) {
418 // Display selected item to the right of the $ symbol
419 // May want to reduce spacing
420 elements_scrollable_text_line(
421 canvas, name_start_x, 56, 60, name, scroll_counter, false);
422 } else {
423 // Display the previous items above the user's name line
424 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 2, 56 - i * 12, item->label);
425 }
426 }
427
428 break;
429 }
430
431 default:
432 break;
433 }
434
435 furi_string_free(name);
436 } else {
437 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 2, 32, "Empty");
438 elements_scrollbar(canvas, 0, 0);
439 }
440}
441
442static bool menu_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
443 Menu* menu = context;
444 bool consumed = true;
445 if(xtreme_settings.menu_style == MenuStyleVertical &&
446 furi_hal_rtc_is_flag_set(FuriHalRtcFlagHandOrient)) {
447 if(event->key == InputKeyLeft) {
448 event->key = InputKeyRight;
449 } else if(event->key == InputKeyRight) {
450 event->key = InputKeyLeft;
451 }
452 }
453
454 if(event->type == InputTypeShort) {
455 switch(event->key) {
456 case InputKeyUp:
457 menu_process_up(menu);
458 break;
459 case InputKeyDown:
460 menu_process_down(menu);
461 break;
462 case InputKeyLeft:
463 menu_process_left(menu);
464 break;
465 case InputKeyRight:
466 menu_process_right(menu);
467 break;
468 case InputKeyOk:
469 menu_process_ok(menu);
470 break;
471 default:
472 consumed = false;
473 break;
474 }
475 } else if(event->type == InputTypeRepeat) {
476 switch(event->key) {
477 case InputKeyUp:
478 menu_process_up(menu);
479 break;
480 case InputKeyDown:
481 menu_process_down(menu);
482 break;
483 case InputKeyLeft:
484 menu_process_left(menu);
485 break;
486 case InputKeyRight:
487 menu_process_right(menu);
488 break;
489 default:
490 consumed = false;
491 break;
492 }
493 } else {
494 consumed = false;
495 }
496
497 return consumed;
498}
499
500static void menu_scroll_timer_callback(void* context) {
501 Menu* menu = context;
502 with_view_model(
503 menu->view, MenuModel * model, { model->scroll_counter++; }, true);
504}
505
506static void menu_enter(void* context) {
507 Menu* menu = context;
508 with_view_model(
509 menu->view,
510 MenuModel * model,
511 {
512 MenuItem* item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, model->position);
513 if(item && item->icon) {
514 icon_animation_start(item->icon);
515 }
516 model->scroll_counter = 0;
517 },
518 true);
519 furi_timer_start(menu->scroll_timer, 333);
520}
521
522static void menu_exit(void* context) {
523 Menu* menu = context;
524 with_view_model(
525 menu->view,
526 MenuModel * model,
527 {
528 MenuItem* item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, model->position);
529 if(item && item->icon) {
530 icon_animation_stop(item->icon);
531 }
532 },
533 false);
534 furi_timer_stop(menu->scroll_timer);
535}
536
537Menu* menu_alloc() {
538 Menu* menu = malloc(sizeof(Menu));
539 menu->view = view_alloc(menu->view);
540 view_set_context(menu->view, menu);
541 view_allocate_model(menu->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(MenuModel));
542 view_set_draw_callback(menu->view, menu_draw_callback);
543 view_set_input_callback(menu->view, menu_input_callback);
544 view_set_enter_callback(menu->view, menu_enter);
545 view_set_exit_callback(menu->view, menu_exit);
546
547 menu->scroll_timer = furi_timer_alloc(menu_scroll_timer_callback, FuriTimerTypePeriodic, menu);
548
549 with_view_model(
550 menu->view,
551 MenuModel * model,
552 {
553 MenuItemArray_init(model->items);
554 model->position = 0;
555 },
556 true);
557
558 return menu;
559}
560
561void menu_free(Menu* menu) {
562 furi_assert(menu);
563 menu_reset(menu);
564 with_view_model(
565 menu->view, MenuModel * model, { MenuItemArray_clear(model->items); }, false);
566 view_free(menu->view);
567 furi_timer_free(menu->scroll_timer);
568 free(menu);
569}
570
571View* menu_get_view(Menu* menu) {
572 furi_assert(menu);
573 return (menu->view);
574}
575
576void menu_add_item(
577 Menu* menu,
578 const char* label,
579 const Icon* icon,
580 uint32_t index,
581 MenuItemCallback callback,
582 void* context) {
583 furi_assert(menu);
584 furi_assert(label);
585
586 MenuItem* item = NULL;
587 with_view_model(
588 menu->view,
589 MenuModel * model,
590 {
591 item = MenuItemArray_push_new(model->items);
592 item->label = label;
593 item->icon = icon ? icon_animation_alloc(icon) : icon_animation_alloc(&A_Plugins_14);
594 view_tie_icon_animation(menu->view, item->icon);
595 item->index = index;
596 item->callback = callback;
597 item->callback_context = context;
598 },
599 true);
600}
601
602void menu_reset(Menu* menu) {
603 furi_assert(menu);
604 with_view_model(
605 menu->view,
606 MenuModel * model,
607 {
608 for
609 M_EACH(item, model->items, MenuItemArray_t) {
610 icon_animation_stop(item->icon);
611 icon_animation_free(item->icon);
612 }
613
614 MenuItemArray_reset(model->items);
615 model->position = 0;
616 },
617 true);
618}
619
620void menu_set_selected_item(Menu* menu, uint32_t index) {
621 with_view_model(
622 menu->view,
623 MenuModel * model,
624 {
625 if(index < MenuItemArray_size(model->items) && index != model->position) {
626 model->scroll_counter = 0;
627
628 MenuItem* item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, model->position);
629 if(item && item->icon) {
630 icon_animation_stop(item->icon);
631 }
632
633 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, index);
634 if(item && item->icon) {
635 icon_animation_start(item->icon);
636 }
637
638 model->position = index;
639 }
640 },
641 true);
642}
643
644static void menu_process_up(Menu* menu) {
645 size_t position;
646 with_view_model(
647 menu->view,
648 MenuModel * model,
649 {
650 position = model->position;
651 size_t count = MenuItemArray_size(model->items);
652 size_t vertical_offset = model->vertical_offset;
653
654 switch(xtreme_settings.menu_style) {
655 case MenuStyleList:
656 case MenuStyleEurocorp:
657 case MenuStyleTerminal:
658 if(position > 0) {
659 position--;
660 if(vertical_offset && vertical_offset == position) {
661 vertical_offset--;
662 }
663 } else {
664 position = count - 1;
665 vertical_offset = count - 8;
666 }
667 break;
668 case MenuStyleWii:
669 if(position % 2 || (position == count - 1 && count % 2)) {
670 position--;
671 } else {
672 position++;
673 }
674 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
675 break;
676 case MenuStyleC64:
677 case MenuStyleCompact:
678 if(position > 0) {
679 position--;
680 } else {
681 position = count - 1;
682 }
683 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
684 break;
685
686 default:
687 break;
688 }
689
690 model->vertical_offset = vertical_offset;
691 },
692 false);
693 menu_set_selected_item(menu, position);
694}
695
696static void menu_process_down(Menu* menu) {
697 size_t position;
698 with_view_model(
699 menu->view,
700 MenuModel * model,
701 {
702 position = model->position;
703 size_t count = MenuItemArray_size(model->items);
704 size_t vertical_offset = model->vertical_offset;
705
706 switch(xtreme_settings.menu_style) {
707 case MenuStyleList:
708 case MenuStyleEurocorp:
709 case MenuStyleTerminal:
710 if(position < count - 1) {
711 position++;
712 if(vertical_offset < count - 8 && vertical_offset == position - 7) {
713 vertical_offset++;
714 }
715 } else {
716 position = 0;
717 vertical_offset = 0;
718 }
719 break;
720 case MenuStyleWii:
721 if(position % 2 || (position == count - 1 && count % 2)) {
722 position--;
723 } else {
724 position++;
725 }
726 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
727 break;
728 case MenuStyleC64:
729 case MenuStyleCompact:
730 if(position < count - 1) {
731 position++;
732 } else {
733 position = 0;
734 }
735 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
736 break;
737
738 default:
739 break;
740 }
741
742 model->vertical_offset = vertical_offset;
743 },
744 false);
745 menu_set_selected_item(menu, position);
746}
747
748static void menu_process_left(Menu* menu) {
749 size_t position;
750 with_view_model(
751 menu->view,
752 MenuModel * model,
753 {
754 position = model->position;
755 size_t count = MenuItemArray_size(model->items);
756 size_t vertical_offset = model->vertical_offset;
757
758 switch(xtreme_settings.menu_style) {
759 case MenuStyleWii:
760 if(position < 2) {
761 if(count % 2) {
762 position = count - 1;
763 } else {
764 position = count - 2 + position % 2;
765 }
766 } else {
767 position -= 2;
768 }
769 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
770 break;
771 case MenuStyleDsi:
772 case MenuStylePs4:
773 case MenuStyleVertical:
774 if(position > 0) {
775 position--;
776 if(vertical_offset && vertical_offset == position) {
777 vertical_offset--;
778 }
779 } else {
780 position = count - 1;
781 vertical_offset = count - 8;
782 }
783 break;
784 case MenuStyleC64:
785 if((position % 10) < 5) {
786 position = position + 5;
787 } else {
788 position = position - 5;
789 }
790 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
791 break;
792 case MenuStyleCompact:
793 if((position % 16) < 8) {
794 position = position + 8;
795 } else {
796 position = position - 8;
797 }
798 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
799 break;
800
801 default:
802 break;
803 }
804
805 model->vertical_offset = vertical_offset;
806 },
807 false);
808 menu_set_selected_item(menu, position);
809}
810
811static void menu_process_right(Menu* menu) {
812 size_t position;
813 with_view_model(
814 menu->view,
815 MenuModel * model,
816 {
817 position = model->position;
818 size_t count = MenuItemArray_size(model->items);
819 size_t vertical_offset = model->vertical_offset;
820
821 switch(xtreme_settings.menu_style) {
822 case MenuStyleWii:
823 if(count % 2) {
824 if(position == count - 1) {
825 position = 0;
826 } else if(position == count - 2) {
827 position = count - 1;
828 } else {
829 position += 2;
830 }
831 } else {
832 position += 2;
833 if(position >= count) {
834 position = position % 2;
835 }
836 }
837 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
838 break;
839 case MenuStyleDsi:
840 case MenuStylePs4:
841 case MenuStyleVertical:
842 if(position < count - 1) {
843 position++;
844 if(vertical_offset < count - 8 && vertical_offset == position - 7) {
845 vertical_offset++;
846 }
847 } else {
848 position = 0;
849 vertical_offset = 0;
850 }
851 break;
852 case MenuStyleC64:
853 if((position % 10) < 5) {
854 position = position + 5;
855 } else {
856 position = position - 5;
857 }
858 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
859 break;
860 case MenuStyleCompact:
861 if((position % 16) < 8) {
862 position = position + 8;
863 } else {
864 position = position - 8;
865 }
866 vertical_offset = CLAMP(MAX((int)position - 4, 0), MAX((int)count - 8, 0), 0);
867 break;
868
869 default:
870 break;
871 }
872
873 model->vertical_offset = vertical_offset;
874 },
875 false);
876 menu_set_selected_item(menu, position);
877}
878
879static void menu_process_ok(Menu* menu) {
880 MenuItem* item = NULL;
881 with_view_model(
882 menu->view,
883 MenuModel * model,
884 {
885 if(model->position < MenuItemArray_size(model->items)) {
886 item = MenuItemArray_get(model->items, model->position);
887 }
888 },
889 true);
890 if(item && item->callback) {
891 item->callback(item->callback_context, item->index);
892 }
893}
